main.name: Tair Hadad
main.description:
I'm a 4rd year Software Engineering student who is looking for a student position job with a learning and developmental perspective.
 I'm organized and methodical, able to learn independently and highly motivated to learn and progress.
main.bio:
I'm looking for a development student job. During the degree I independently studied mobile application development in java in android studio environment with firebase database.
 Also has knowledge of languages: c, c ++, c #, python, sql.
 I have a high self-learning ability and tremendous motivation to start working in the field.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
